title: (x) Wieselburger Bier logo - similar to Herold {Mike Y}
content:
Looking for a font equal or similar to this Austrian beer company's logo. Any help would be greatly appreciated. thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204514im_/http:/typophile.com/files/WieselburgerBier_4613.jpg)
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content:
I've just started looking, but the open or fill faces of Font Mesa's [Rodeo Clown](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontmesa/rodeo-clown/) have a similar feel.

- Mike Yanega

Except for the W, [Herold](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204514/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/paratype/herold/) is also rather similar.

- Mike Yanega
I was thinking of Herold too. You might also consider [Eckmann](http://web.archive.org/web/20150426204514/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/linotype/eckmann/) which is similarly art nouveau.
awesome guys thanks for the help!
